name: Rescue People 3D
description:
Draw a line and help them!

The line you draw will be 3D.
The line will protect them from dangerous obstacles.

Please draw freely.
There is no right way to solve it.

Somehow they multiply as they pass through the gate.
Help a lot and get a lot of chips!

This game has a lot of trap such as saws, cannons, trampolines, and so on.
Use the obstacles and terrain to your advantage to guide them!
